mapper.select: select info.trackId, info.trackTitle, info.mediaDuration, info.orderNum, info.createTime, MAX(IF(info.statType = '0701', info.statNum, 0)) as playStatNum, MAX(IF(info.statType = '0704', info.statNum, 0)) as commentStatNum from (select track.id as trackId, track.track_title as trackTitle, track.media_duration as mediaDuration, track.order_num as orderNum, track.create_time as createTime, stat.stat_type as statType, stat.stat_num as statNum from track_info track left join track_stat stat on stat.track_id = track.id where track.album_id = #{albumId} and track.is_open = '1' and track.status = '0501') info group by info.trackId order by info.orderNum asc
